    • Method Detail

      • moveCharacterInCanvas

        public void moveCharacterInCanvas(int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int z,
                                  java.lang.Boolean canBeMovedUp,
                                  java.lang.Boolean canBeMovedDown,
                                  java.lang.Boolean isStart,
                                  java.lang.Boolean isSolvingNow)
        move the character in the canvas,and then draw it on the canvas
        Parameters:
        x - the x axis of the position that the character move to
        y - the y axis of the position that the character move to
        z - the z axis of the position that the character move to
        canBeMovedUp - if in the new position there is an option to move up
        canBeMovedDown - if in the new position there is an option to move down
        isStart - if start was pressed
        isSolvingNow - if now the character is moving in the maze
